name: Ember's escape
description:
Help ember run back into the fires of hell as the deepest levels of the inferno start to freeze over! Seems like a simple platformer but beware, there is a 'fun' twist on the camera mechanic :)   

A and D to move forward and back, and space to jump.

Game created by  https://itch.io/profile/magikamush, https://itch.io/profile/gwd and https://itch.io/profile/courtneyspivey .
